items.sentence: Several students in the back of the classroom laughed quietly.

Cigarette butts are the biggest source of litter in the world.
I really admire Tom\'s ability to get people to work together.
I suspect that Tom knows Mary doesn\'t live in Boston anymore.
Tom was convinced that he\'d be happier if he moved to Boston.

I wonder whether or not Tom knew it was a bad idea to do that.
The dentist told me that he has to pull out three of my teeth.
